mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_accnumber_mdmid (company_id, accnumber, type, device_id, site_id, synele) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{accnumber}, #{type}, #{deviceId}, #{siteId}, #{synele})
mapper.delete: delete from t_accnumber_mdmid where company_id = #{companyId} and accnumber = #{accnumber}
mapper.update: update t_accnumber_mdmid set synele = #{synele} where company_id = #{companyId} and accnumber = #{accnumber}
